section.p: You wake up to find your feet in a pool of water. You must have dozed off on the beach and now the tide is coming in. The mate is bending over you. ‘Were you having a dream, skipper?’ he asks. ‘We ought to be getting back on board.’

As you row back out to the ship, one of your crewmen mentions how he spent the afternoon watching a swarm of wasps fight a snake that was trying to get into their nest. For a fleeting moment it seems to evoke a familiar memory...
You give the order to weigh anchor. .
